resources.string: Embracing sustainable transportation practices is key for reducing carbon footprints. Opting for greener alternatives like walking, biking to campus, carpooling, and using public transportation can significantly reduce emissions.

Ensuring that the information you provide is accurate and up-to-date. Regularly updating the app to benefit from new features and improvements.
4. User Responsibilities You are responsible for:
C-Verde collects and processes personal information, such as your daily activities, energy usage, and travel habits, to calculate your carbon footprint.
Avoid any unauthorized access, tampering, or reverse engineering of the application.
• Use the app for lawful purposes and in compliance with all applicable laws.
• Provide accurate data regarding your activities to ensure accurate carbon footprint tracking.
C-Verde is a carbon footprint tracker that allows users to monitor and reduce their environmental impact. By using the application, you agree to:
By downloading, installing, or using the C-Verde application, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the application.
